_comment: Created by NCODowd on 13/09/2016 11:07:18 using v2.7
title: What are patients' overall experiences of their GP surgeries?
analysis_commentary:
The majority of respondents to the GP Patient Survey have said overall their experiences of their GP surgeries were good: 85% of patients said their experiences were either very or fairly good in 2015/16. This is a slight imrpovement on 2014/15 but still lower than previous years.

Updated August 2016.
